让声音和声音对抗，而不是捂住耳朵。

we need ti make ourselves public, we nerd to humanize ourselves, we need to be courageous(guts), we neef to really take an equal  seat at the table in the societies. we need to open up. we need to be free.equal.

On this world social issue, I totally agree 100%. This racial discrimination issue has lasted for a very very long time in the employment field everywhere around the globe, not just in Germany. I should be in the program to voice it out loud too. Self-esteem and Dignity is #☝️.
